author: Staff Reporter
text:
Coimbatore Judicial Magistrate – II Rajkumar on Tuesday ordered actor Simbu and music director Anirudh to appear before the court on March 21, in connection with the alleged composing and singing of the controversial ‘Beep Song’ which contained lyrics denigrating women.

The direction was given on a petition filed by Elango from Ganapathy here on January 4 accusing the actor and music director of composing the song.

Sections

The defendants have been booked under Section 292 (sale or publicising obscene content) of the Indian Penal Code and Section 67 (punishment for publishing or transmitting obscene material in electronic form) of the Information Technology Act.
title: Simbu, Anirudh asked to appear before court
